    1. parse(File)

Interface SchemaParser

All Known Implementing Classes:
JsonSchemaParser, XmlSchemaParser
public interface SchemaParser
Defines the contract for schema parsers capable of reading external schema files and converting them into a SchemaModel. Implementations of this interface handle different schema formats such as JSON or XML.

Each implementation is responsible for validating the input file, interpreting its structure, and producing a unified internal model used by the Schema2Script application for SQL script generation.

Author:
Nik Kaučić

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    SchemaModel
    parse(File schemaFile)
    Parses the provided schema file and converts it into a SchemaModel.

  • Method Details

    • parse

      SchemaModel parse(File schemaFile) throws SchemaParsingException
      Parses the provided schema file and converts it into a SchemaModel. Implementations must validate the file format and handle malformed or incomplete schema definitions appropriately.
      Parameters:
      schemaFile - the input file containing the schema definition
      Returns:
      a populated SchemaModel representing the parsed schema
      Throws:
      SchemaParsingException - if the file cannot be read or contains an invalid structure
